TopicTitle: Ps5 EVA Construction? Inventory slots for modules?

Articles.Content: I was going to put this under an older thread but it told me it was too old and to start a new one. I play on PS5. I csnt figure out how to go into construction mode during an EVA. I also can't figure out how to open the inventory slots for the modules. I can only open the slots in the storage boxes. The only thing I've been able to do with kerbals inventory is the ground science stuff nothing else. Is this not a ps5 thing? What happens when a solar panel gets knocked off? Do you have to deorbit the station and fly up a new one?
